text: Yeah I would love to have it inline - e.g. with a Text parent and have the text wrap underneath it if necessary. We’re trying to build responsive-ish designs, but it’s proving tricky.

We’re working with Reps that seem to be either on a small MacBook Air - or some enormous 27 inch 4K monitor.. And it’s really difficult to design middle- or sidepanel cards that look good on both without media queries.
